item.title: 🦀 hoangsonww/Passwordless-Auth-Rust (20 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: hoangsonww

📝 Repository: hoangsonww/Passwordless-Auth-Rust

📄 Descrizione: 🚔 Self-hosted passwordless authentication server in Rust offering magic links, WebAuthn, and TOTP fallback with JWT-based session management and revocable refresh tokens. Includes reliable email queueing, SQLite persistence, and containerized deployment via Docker for internal tools without relying on third-party identity providers.

⭐ Stelle: 20

🍴 Forks: 15

💻 Linguaggio: Rust

🏷️ Topics: axum c csharp docker docker-compose jwt make makefile password passwordless passwordless-authentication passwordless-login rust secure shell sql sqlite totp totp-generator webauthn

📜 Licenza: MIT License

⏰ Creato il: 2025-08-01T21:05:23Z

🔄 Ultimo Aggiornamento: 2025-08-05T10:56:19Z
